metadata.title: Marine Casualty and Pollution Database by the U.S. Coast Guard
metadata.description: Coast Guard record keeping and information analysis on marine pollution incidents, vessels casualties, vessel information and other matters containing information on these areas for incidents which occur on the Bering Sea and other parts of Alaska.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Coast Guard record keeping and information analysis on marine pollution incidents, vessels casualties, vessel information and other matters containing information on these areas for incidents which occur on the Bering Sea and other parts of Alaska.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: Federal Government maintained database which does contain Privacy Act Material

Use constraints: Quality of information is uneven /  information can be very difficult to extract and largely was to be done through Washington D.C.

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

FGDC metadata date: 19980723

FGDC metadata standard: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

FGDC metadata version: FGDC-STD-001-1998

Distribution liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

FGDC metadata date: 19980723
FGDC metadata contact: Kimberly Bahl
FGDC metadata standard: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata (version: FGDC-STD-001-1998)
FGDC metadata access constraints: Federal Government maintained database which does contain Privacy Act Material
FGDC metadata use constraints: Quality of information is uneven /  information can be very difficult to extract and largely was to be done through Washington D.C.
